title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.2 - Title and citation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.2 - Title and citation

State Regulations

Within and for the purposes of the Department of Labor this

Part (rule) may be known and cited as Industrial Code Rule No. 43, in full or
by abbreviation, as an alternative and without prejudice to its designation and
citation established by the Secretary of State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
43.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
